SEARCH
Package ccprog3_mco2

Class VendingMachine

java.lang.Object
ccprog3_mco2.VendingMachine
Direct Known Subclasses:
RegularVM, SpecialVM
public abstract class VendingMachine extends Object
This abstract class contains all the commone attributes and methods of a Vending Machine

  • Constructor Details

    • VendingMachine

      public VendingMachine(int numSlots, int slotCapacity)
      This constructor represents the creation of a vending machine
      Parameters:
      numSlots - the number of slots in a vending machine
      slotCapacity - the maximum slot capacity of a vending machine

  • Method Details

    • isSlotEmpty

      public boolean isSlotEmpty(int index)
      This method checks if a specific slot is empty using the slot index. It returns true if it is empty and false if it is not.
      Parameters:
      index - the slot index of the slot to check
      Returns:
      the state of the slot, true for empty and false for not empty

    • isSlotNumValid

      public boolean isSlotNumValid(int number)
      This method checks if a given slot number is valid.
      Parameters:
      number - the given slot number
      Returns:
      true if the number is valid, false if it is not

    • dispenseItem

      public String dispenseItem(int slotIndex)
      This method simulates the dispensing of an item in a vending machine
      Parameters:
      slotIndex - the slot index of the slot to dispense from
      Returns:
      String containing result of dispense item attempt

    • refillMoney

      public void refillMoney(int moneyType, int qty)
      This method refills the CashRegister of a vending machine given a money type and a quantity
      Parameters:
      moneyType - the kind of money to refill with
      qty - the quantity of the specified money type

    • getSlotItem

      public Item getSlotItem(int slotIndex)
      This method returns the item of a slot given the slot index.
      Parameters:
      slotIndex - the given slot index
      Returns:
      the item in the specified slot

    • restockSlot

      public boolean restockSlot(int index, int qty)
      This method restocks a slot given a specified slot index and a quantity
      Parameters:
      index - the slot index of slot to restock
      qty - the quantity to add to the specified slot
      Returns:
      true if slock was successfully restocked, false if now

    • isItemDuplicate

      public boolean isItemDuplicate(Item item)
      This method checks if a given item already exists in a vending machine.
      Parameters:
      item - the given item to check
      Returns:
      true if item is duplicate, false if it is not.

      Returns:

    • displayAllItemInfo

      public String displayAllItemInfo()
      This method displays the all item information in a vending machine
      Returns:
      String containing item information for all slots

    • collectAllMoney

      public String collectAllMoney()
      This method collects all money stored in the CashRegister of a vending machine.
      Returns:
      String containing dispensed amount and message signifying an empty cash register

    • collectMoney

      public String collectMoney(int amount)
      This method collects a specified amount from a vending machine
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to gather in denominations
      Returns:
      the String detailing result of money collection

    • displayMoneyQty

      public String displayMoneyQty()
      This method displays the money stored in the CashRegister of a vending machine. It specifies the kind of bill or coin and their quantities.
      Returns:
      the stored quantities per money type in CashRegister

    • replaceItemInSlot

      public boolean replaceItemInSlot(int slotIndex, Item item)
      This method replaces the item assigned to a slot in a vending machine given a slot index and an item.
      Parameters:
      slotIndex - the given slot index
      item - the new item that replaces to current one
      Returns:
      true if replacement was successful, false if it is not

    • displayAllInvInfo

      public String displayAllInvInfo()
      This method displays the inventory information of all slots in a vending machine
      Returns:
      String containing inventory information of all slots

    • initializeItemPool

      public void initializeItemPool()
      This method initializes the item pool from which the user may select from

    • createNewItem

      public boolean createNewItem(String itemName, double price, double calories, boolean isSoldAlone, String preparations)
      This method creates a new item to be added to itemPool
      Parameters:
      itemName - name of new item
      price - price of new item
      calories - calorie count of new item
      isSoldAlone - stand-alone vendibility of new item
      preparations - preparation method of new item
      Returns:
      true if item was successfully created and added to itemPool, false if not

    • repriceItem

      public boolean repriceItem(double newPrice, int slotIndex)
      This method reprices the item in a specified slot.
      Parameters:
      newPrice - the new price of the item
      slotIndex - the slot index of the item
      Returns:
      true if item was successfully repriced, false if not

    • updateCashRegister

      public void updateCashRegister(HashMap<Integer,Integer> moneyTally, HashMap<Integer,Integer> denominationsTally, ArrayList<Money> money)
      This method updates the CashRegister of a vending machine.
      Parameters:
      moneyTally - the quantities of each money type in the form of a HashMap
      denominationsTally - the quantities of each money type upon computing denominations in the form of a HashMap
      money - the ArrayList of Money in a CashRegister

    • isSlotAssigned

      public boolean isSlotAssigned(int slotIndex)
      This method checks if a specified slot is assigned or labeled to an item
      Parameters:
      slotIndex - the index of the slot to check
      Returns:
      true if the slot is assigned to an item, false if not

    • getItemPool

      public ArrayList<Item> getItemPool()
      This method returns the itemPool of a vending machine
      Returns:
      itemPool ArrayList

    • isNumberValid

      public boolean isNumberValid(int num)
      This method checks if a number is a valid amount for price (in the context of a vending machine)
      Parameters:
      num - the number to check
      Returns:
      true if number is valid (non-negative, and no decimal places), false if not

    • getSlots

      public Slot[] getSlots()
      This method returns the slots of a vending machine
      Returns:
